name: AST TEAM STUDENT PORTAL
description: The Hackathon Management System Student Portal is a Progressive Web App (PWA) designed to facilitate the seamless organization and participation in hackathons. It provides students with features like easy registration, event listings, team formation, and real-time collaboration tools. With offline capabilities and a mobile-friendly interface, this PWA ensures a smooth and engaging hackathon experience anytime, anywhere.
